alert.note: Alert for Culebra (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued June 09 at 7:04AM ADT until June 09 at 6:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Prolonged periods of dangerously hot temperatures and high humidity possible with heat indices of 112 degrees Fahrenheit or more. * WHERE...along the urban and coastal areas of Puerto Rico. * WHEN....For the Excessive Heat Warning, through 5 PM AST today. For the Excessive Heat Watch through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The combination of hot temperatures and high humidity will create dangerous situations in which heat related illnesses are possible.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions, if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency, call 9 1 1.
